Summary: Compares LSTM, Transformer, and LLMs for daily stock prediction; Transformers lead in accuracy, and cleaned LLM outputs achieve strong RMSE.
DRL portfolio optimization for Brazilian assets integrates Gemini-Pro-derived Portuguese news sentiment and fundamentals.
Uses diffusion models to denoise financial time series, improving downstream return-classification and trading efficiency.
Assesses ChatGPT-4o for financial data analysis tasks (e.g., ARMA-GARCH), finding broadly comparable performance to traditional software with caveats.
Presents HybridCGAN/HybridACGAN for portfolio analysis, learning trends while modeling uncertainty; improves allocation on US/EU datasets.
Applies an Attention-BiGRU model to predict prices for CL=F, DAX, GDAXI, and HSI, achieving low RMSE/MAE across datasets.
Hybrid GA+LLM (Mixtral 8x7B) recommends profitable prices for agricultural products using real-time market data.
Performs EDA and proposes a reward-focused loss for ANN-based auto-trading; backtests on equities, oil, and BTC with improved returns.
Uses a wavelet-based GAN to generate synthetic stock-price trends and improve prediction over deep baselines.
Integrates news sentiment with XGBoost to forecast IHSG prices and reports accuracy gains from sentiment features.
Systems paper proposing Hierarchically Pruned Attention to speed long-context LLM inference; not a finance application.
Proposes a wavelet-based nonlinear OLS method for un-stationary/chaotic stock systems, claiming competitive accuracy with lower cost and better interpretability.
Chinese-language review of ChatGPT covering history, mechanisms, applications, growth, and limitations; no specific financial modeling study.
Combines generative models of asset returns with portfolio optimization and bandit-style blending; crypto portfolio simulations show outperformance.
Forecasts direction-of-change for Australia’s All Ordinaries Index with kernel density estimators emphasizing recent data to avoid overfitting.
Constructs multimodal (text+image) investor sentiment with RoBERTa and Inception and shows it enhances multifactor stock selection and timing.
Comprehensive review of social-media sentiment analysis methods, applications, and gaps, noting limited real-world use of large Transformer models to date.
Proposes a self-regulated GAN combining cooperative networks to reduce stochasticity/overfitting in tweets+price data for stock movement prediction; achieves SOTA on a public set.
Forecasts NFT prices using autoregression and a transformer time-series model with macro factors; transformers reduce preprocessing burden.
AI Oracle: blockchain-backed oracle system to feed verified data to LLMs/agents; architecture paper, not a price-prediction model.
Measures systemic risk from coordinated LLM-driven stock-prediction signals across industries and models, proposing governance mechanisms.
Builds a real-time analysis platform for top NSE-50 equities; LLMs serve the interface while analytics aggregates filings to tick-level updates.
Conceptual article on Transformer-based risk assessment in enterprises across domains (compliance, cybersecurity, finance).
Presents AT-FinGPT, an audio-text LLM that fuses earnings-call audio and text to improve financial risk prediction over baselines.
Adapts BERT-style models to represent numeric stock data and directly predict prices/price movements.
PhD work: transformers for sentiment and item classification from news/retail data; sentiment indices show predictive power in downturns.
GPT-4 generates rationales to explain sequential predictions (incl. financial TS), improving interpretability and sometimes accuracy.
Compares credibility/impact/detectability of LLM- vs GAN-generated financial headlines; highlights moderation vulnerabilities.
Agora is an LLM MoE system with API calls for climate/agriculture Q&A; not a finance price predictor.
Releases AlphaFin datasets and a RAG-based Stock-Chain framework enabling LLM-driven stock trend prediction and financial QA with improved analysis.
Uses a ConvLSTM+MLP GAN for end-to-end multi-class classification of financial time series (volatility trend), outperforming baselines.
ORGAN-FVT, a ConvLSTM+MLP GAN with ordinal regression, improves multi-class volatility trend prediction on MSFT, TSLA, and PICC stocks.
Builds an LLM-based platform for large-scale Twitter sentiment analysis; discusses downstream uses like predicting sales or returns, but the task is sentiment classification.
Uses LSTM on CSI 300 data and a classic moving-average backtest; discusses how LLMs help code scaffolding and risks of using LLM-generated code.
Cryptocurrency analytics using modern DL (e.g., LSTM/GRU/BiLSTM) for price forecasting, fraud detection, sentiment, and risk; improved errors vs baselines.
GPT-based few-shot approach predicts software issue labels with high precision/recall.
Surveys AI-based fraud detection in telecommunications, emphasizing the emergence of generative AI tools in combating fraud and improving data security.
Blends LLM-derived semantic signals with ML across fundamental/technical/entropy frameworks to predict NASDAQ-100 stock returns and build portfolio strategies.
Evaluates Lag-Llama vs DeepAR/TFT for Indonesian stocks; Lag-Llama competitive on select groups; not an LLM.
Shows GPT-based headline sentiment can drive stock-return strategies and studies debiasing via anonymization.
Case study on WeWork: derives news sentiment with LLMs and finds a weak positive correlation (~16%) with stock price moves.
Conceptual assessment of applying NLP/LLM models to stock price prediction and outlining future experiments.
Detects lead-lag structures in multivariate equity time series via directed network clustering and evaluates on U.S. equities.
Introduces hierarchical Bayesian online learning of time-varying hazard rates for change-point detection in streaming data.
Analyzes investor emotions from social media for Bitcoin and shows certain emotional states predict better returns.
Fuses context-aware designs and multi-signal integration for Chinese financial sentiment; improves classification and downstream tasks.
Finds investors following ChatGPT advice trade with less disposition bias and perform better in a crypto experiment due to reduced cognitive dissonance.
Zero-shot prompts forecast firms’ revenue/net income; explores AI benchmark vs predictive accuracy links and reliability practices.
Shows V-shaped returns around forced CEO turnovers and uses LLM-based disclosure measures to document sequential bad- then good-news releases.
Compares lexicon, ML, and ChatGPT for sentiment on U.S. big/small-cap tweets; Random Forest is most accurate.
Introduces CORRGAN, a GAN to sample realistic financial correlation matrices reproducing stylized facts for trading/risk applications.
Fine-tunes GPT-3.5-turbo to predict equity option prices, outperforming Black-Scholes on MAE/RMSE.
FAMA uses LLMs with cross-sample selection and chain-of-experience to mine interpretable return factors that improve S&P 500 predictions and simulated performance.
Uses BERT summaries of patent texts to explain valuation and predict future earnings and stock returns, revealing investor underreaction.
Constructs a carbon-neutrality uncertainty index using ChatGPT-generated keywords; higher sensitivity predicts lower future returns in China.
Constructs a ChatGPT-based commodity news ratio index that significantly predicts commodity futures index excess returns, outperforming BERT and BoW.
Uses ChatGPT to label Bitcoin-news sentiment and feeds it with market factors into a KNN model to predict market risk (VaR), improving accuracy over no-sentiment baselines.
Simulates auditors’ intent to use ML for stock prediction and finds ChatGPT usage strengthens technology–adoption relationships.
Detects fake product reviews with ensemble classifiers; discusses LLM-generated bogus reviews for dataset creation.
Uses retrieval-augmented LLMs (GPT/LLaMA) as the classifier over combined tabular financials and news to predict stock price movement.
Survey of financial sentiment analysis comparing BERT/FinBERT/LLMs across datasets with a crypto case study.
Compares fine-tuned SLM (Phi-2/QLoRA) vs GPT-4 for stock move prediction from news/tweets; fine-tuned SLM slightly wins.
Benchmarks a specialized LLM (“Quantum”) vs humans and other LLMs for market prediction using news/social sentiment.
Compares GPT-4o and FinBERT for sectoral news sentiment, showing prompt-optimized GPT-4o can outperform FinBERT by up to 10%.
Compares vision-instruct LLMs on candlestick images vs vision/numeric models; post-hoc calibrated LLMs achieve competitive stock-move prediction.
Proposes a GAN with GRU generator and CNN discriminator to forecast gold/silver prices on MCX, outperforming LSTM/Bi-LSTM.
Forecasts short-term market volatility from news and uses GPT-2 with a constrained beam allocator to generate fluent, human-readable explanations of the predictions.
Generates GPT-2 news to augment limited datasets and builds a model that evaluates news by stock price fluctuation rate to predict/evaluate stock moves; accuracy improves with generated data.
Uses table-arrangement techniques and ChatGPT to extract 22 factors from newspaper articles related to stock moves; proposes a scalable pipeline with high extraction accuracy.
Shows deep interactions between narrative and numeric disclosures greatly increase informativeness for forecasting beliefs/earnings persistence.
Presents Con-SEN, a Longformer-based, regulation-aware sentence-level engine for contract clause, legality, and risk recognition, outperforming general LLMs.
Defines corporate event prediction from earnings call summaries and shows raw/fine-tuned LLMs can automate the task effectively.
Time-series foundation model (transformer-style) with historical simulation improves VaR forecasts for crude oil futures.
Adapts LLMs (e.g., Llama 3.1) with weighted loss, features, and sentiment for volatile time-series forecasting, outperforming LSTMs and stats models.
Dual-prediction crypto model fuses macro fluctuations, sentiment rescaling, and technical indicators for next-day close forecasts.
Develops CryptoTrade, a reflective LLM-based agent integrating on-chain and off-chain data for zero-shot crypto trading; outperforms time-series baselines.
Generates long-term stock recommendations; neural nets predict prices while DeepSeek LLM provides XAI narratives and security guidance.
Argues for treating data as infrastructure in digital markets and AI, with policy implications for competition and governance.
Survey of neural network methods for stock forecasting (2015–2023), including RNN/CNN/Transformer/GNN/GAN and LLMs, datasets, and metrics.
Measures 10-K risk-factor tone with dictionaries and GPT variants; GPT-4 tone best predicts weekly U.S. index returns.
Calibrates FX barrier-option models via VAE-GAN augmentation plus neural calibration, accelerating and broadening robust parameter fits.
Opinion piece on security/privacy implications of generative AI’s rise.
Llama-2 chatbot for college support also predicts student cut-off marks via classic regressors.
Combines sentiment features (including LLM-derived) with technical, on-chain, and price data to improve Bitcoin price prediction via LSTM.
Uses reinforcement learning to detect negation scopes for financial news sentiment; notes bias when forecasting returns.
GPT-2 chatbot for college websites also predicts admission cut-offs using classic regressors.
Builds geopolitical risk factors and shows threats have stronger predictive links to global stock returns, especially at short horizons.
Shows ChatGPT-derived news sentiment around dividend announcements predicts subsequent market reactions and supports strategy selection.
Dynamic Bayesian Networks fuse social, market, and technical features to predict crypto directions, outperforming ARIMA/ML/DL/LLM baselines.
Proposes an attention-GRU generative factor model for dynamic CVaR portfolio optimization via simulated returns.
ECC Analyzer uses LLMs to extract rich text/audio features from earnings calls; fused features boost volatility prediction.
Evaluates TextBlob, SVM, Naive Bayes, and ChatGPT for sentiment on NASDAQ-related social media; SVM leads accuracy.
Deep RL automates elevator equipment calibration; synthetic episodes from a generative simulator enable real-time performance.
Models emoji-based sentiment with GPT-4/BERT and links it to crypto markets, informing strategies that avoid drawdowns.
Presents a multi-agent, analyst-style LLM framework for earnings-release analysis, improving reasoning quality and price-direction classification.
Introduces Encoded VaR using variational autoencoders to simulate market scenarios and measure portfolio risk, competitive with standard VaR methods.
Estimates energy usage across computing layers (NLP/AI, scientific computing, crypto mining) and argues for energy-efficiency as a design parameter.
Uses LLMs (e.g., OPT, LLAMA) for large-scale financial news sentiment and finds strong return predictability and trading performance from LLM-derived signals.
Introduces optimized MLSTM with improved bacterial foraging and elitist whale optimization for IDX trend prediction on millions of records. Reports gains over baselines.
Integrates LSTM/Prophet/SARIMAX with LLM-processed social-media sentiment to improve Bitcoin forecasts, with mixed gains across models.
Fine-tuned GPT-4 outperforms FinBERT/BERT/T5/Gemma for crypto sentiment classification; focuses on sentiment, not price prediction.
DeepSeek-V3 prompts generate sentiment signals fed into FinRL; improves RL trading agent performance.
Bike-sharing inventory optimized via generative-model-informed RL; domain is mobility operations, not financial instruments.
Distills sentimental and relational knowledge from large models to augment features, boosting CSI300/CSI500 stock prediction accuracy.
Reviews ML for stock prediction and proposes an LLM-based model (e.g., ChatGPT-4o) reporting ~97% accuracy with tunable parameters.
Studies instruction fine-tuning for crypto sentiment classification, reporting large zero-shot gains and tuning insights across model scales.
Improves Time-LLM architectures to forecast highly volatile Bitcoin prices, reporting sizable accuracy gains over SOTA baselines.
Uses GPT-4 to filter investor comments and fuses them with prices/technical indicators to improve stock timing performance on Chinese banks.
Conceptual review on enterprise generative AI, IoT, blockchain, and fintech operations; no concrete price-prediction model.
Estimates CCP Value at Risk with a BiGAN, yielding fewer margin-call fluctuations versus standard VaR methods on S&P 500 data.
Gives minimax-rate estimators for time changes in noisy Lévy models used in finance, robust to infinite-variation jumps; methodological contribution.
Builds a Spanish financial targeted-sentiment corpus and evaluates Spanish LLMs (MarIA, BETO) for target detection and sentiment toward economic entities.
Uses LLMs to detect buy/avoid signals in crypto influencers’ and news outlets’ tweets and studies their temporal links to crypto prices.
FN-Agents uses RAG, vector DBs and self-reflection so LLMs build interpretable features and boost exchange-rate volatility prediction.
Introduces FNSPID, a large news–price dataset; shows dataset scale and sentiment modestly help transformer models.
Introduces an EVT-based fairness metric (ECD) and shows tail risks can worsen under some mitigators; proposes an ECD mitigator.
Profiles cryptocurrency influencers in few-shot settings using transformer models and augments data by prompting ChatGPT; tops a shared task leaderboard.
Proposes Fin-ALICE, integrating co-occurrence, supply-chain, and emotion analytics with TCNs; outperforms LSTMs/LLMs baselines in forecasts.
FinMem is an LLM-based trading agent with profile/memory/decision modules that turns real-time data into trades, outperforming baselines.
FinVision is a multi-modal, LLM-agent framework for trading that reasons over news and charts with a reflection module to improve decisions.
Fine-tunes several models and finds Gemma-7B best for classifying sentiment of financial headlines.
Fine-tunes encoder/decoder LLMs and aggregates token embeddings to forecast stock returns; LLM signals strengthen portfolios.
Shows Indian ‘finfluencer’ recommendations correlate with stock characteristics and predict future returns.
Proposes CISP, a drift-aware stock predictor inspired by in-context learning with dynamic parameters, outperforming prior methods.
FootPrinter estimates data-center carbon footprint; unrelated to financial price prediction.
Tests ChatGPT-based and news-dictionary sentiment for forecasting Brazil’s Ibovespa; the ChatGPT index does not improve out-of-sample performance.
Forecasts Chinese overnight stock index movement from news summaries; fine-tuned smaller models outperform GPT-3.5/4.
Selects intersection features after hybrid normalization and applies an ANN-based generative model to forecast daily stock movements across six indices.
Forecasts disaster-time needs using seq2seq LSTMs on weather and social data; improves emergency management planning.
Combines multi-filter feature selection and a deep generative model with attention to forecast daily stock trends, outperforming baselines.
Fine-tunes GPT-2 to forecast FX direction using prompts augmented with recent trend descriptions, showing empirical effectiveness.
Forex prediction combining GPT-4/Gemini zero-shot sentiment with LSTM/XGBoost/Transformer features; XGBoost performs best with integrated sentiment.
Reviews generative AI in business/finance and shows ChatGPT-derived environmental sentiment from filings can predict firms’ risk management and stock returns.
MambaMoE integrates DeepSeek-fine-tuned sentiment with selective state-space modeling, beating LSTM/Transformer on short-term stock prediction.
Generates multi-asset implied volatility surfaces with functional PCA and neural SDEs, yielding realistic, arbitrage-aware scenarios.
End-to-end framework with an LSTM price-prediction module and a conversational assistant interface for investor guidance.
Presents a controllable GAN-based method for high-fidelity 3D head avatars without expression tracking.
Presents a GPT-4–powered virtual analyst that reads qualitative sources to score companies and provide investment recommendations with justifications.
Uses a variational autoencoder with LSTM for genre-specific musical style generation; stock prediction is only mentioned as a general DL application.
Surveys generative models (GANs, VAEs, GMMNs) to synthesize realistic financial time series and evaluates with portfolio-trend prediction benchmarks on U.S. stocks.
Surveys generative AI applications in finance, covering use cases, tools (e.g., BloombergGPT), and challenges such as bias and security.
Applies conditional VAEs/normalizing flows to learn the joint return distribution of S&P 500 members for synthetic data, risk, and portfolio uses.
Builds an LSTM-generator/CNN-discriminator GAN for stock index movement; improves direction accuracy and reduces RMSE/time over LSTM alone.
Systematic review of generative AI/IoT/blockchain for fintech risk, credit, and trading automation; descriptive, not a price forecaster.
Shows a text-based geopolitical risk index improves short-term oil futures volatility forecasts within a MIDAS framework; category effects differ by horizon.
Combines CNNs, LSTMs, and Deep Q-Learning on chart images to predict global stock trends across 31 countries over 12 years, surpassing traditional methods.
Forecasts gold prices under high volatility using LSTM, N-HiTS, and TSMixer, showing gains from including sentiment and related indices like silver.
Graph-LLM strategy uses GPT-3 to predict stock-network returns for trading; shows lower volatility and more stable performance.
IRFT treats symbolic risk-factor mining as language modeling to generate closed-form intraday factors that improve investment returns and speed.
Fine-tunes LLMs with QLoRA on earnings-related data to predict post-earnings stock moves, outperforming baselines including GPT-4.
Explores GPT-4 and fine-tuned Open-LLaMA for explainable forecasting of NASDAQ-100 stocks using prices, metadata, and news; LLMs generate decisions and outperform classic baselines.
Analyzes high-frequency spillovers across Bitcoin exchanges in 2017–2018, identifying leaders/followers in return transmission.
Hybrid quantum self-attention plus LSTM accelerates and improves financial time-series forecasting; no LLM usage.
Hybrid LSTM-Transformer with technical indicators and FinBERT sentiment outperforms DL baselines for stock forecasting; GPT mentioned only conceptually.
Studies how geopolitical risk indexes affect volatility of Chinese commodity futures (coal, copper, oil, gold, iron ore) using GARCH/CGARCH/TVP-VAR-SV.
Introduces LLM-VaR and LLM-ES, using GPT models in a zero-shot setup to forecast Value at Risk and Expected Shortfall and benchmarked against econometric models.
LLM identifies related stocks/relations from headlines; GAT fuses related-text features to improve stock movement prediction.
Conceptual paper proposing an info-autopoiesis framework to reason about AI/AGI limits and prospects.
Proposes a GCNN–LSTM for social media information-diffusion popularity plus an LSTM–SVM sentiment module, achieving high accuracy.
Predicts ICO success using social-media data and LLM-based sentiment/metadata analysis across multiple platforms.
Compares FinBERT, GPT-4, and logistic regression for news sentiment and NGX index prediction; LR performs best while GPT-4 shows potential.
Introduces ElliottAgents, a multi-agent LLM system blending Elliott Wave analysis with AI/DRL to recognize patterns and forecast trends.
Forecasts stock prices with a CGAN whose hyperparameters are tuned by a spotted-hyena optimizer, showing gains over baselines.
Bitcoin strategies compared; a ChatGPT-optimized composite index using indicators and sentiment vastly outperforms XGBoost and Buy&Hold.
Uses sequence GANs to model order flow and simulate intra-day price variations reproducing empirical return/volatility features.
ChatGPT-derived news sentiment around dividend announcements predicts intraday abnormal returns; strongest within first two hours.
Proposes a generative model and estimation algorithm using graph Laplacians to recover intrinsic graph structures from observed dependencies between nodes.
InvestED combines LSTM mutual-fund performance prediction with LLM-driven personalized education and gamified tools.
Evaluates six LLMs for day-trading prediction using multimodal prompts (prices, news, images), achieving MAPEs as low as ~1.4–1.7% on certain inputs.
Surveys 108 works on sentiment-driven stock prediction with ML/DL/LLMs, outlining trends, datasets, and gaps.
Graph Transformer predicts S&P 500 stock moves using LLM-generated analyses and FinBERT embeddings fused with numerical data.
Augments a Linear-Transformer+CNN forecaster with LLM-written technical-analysis text embedded by FinBERT, improving stock price predictions.
Presents a multi-agent LLM-based investment advisory platform for energy/natural-resources that combines technical, fundamental, sentiment, and stock price prediction analyses.
Proposes LLM-based feature extraction from financial text plus a self-attention fusion with price data, improving accuracy on Tehran Stock Exchange.
Introduces an LLM-driven knowledge enhancement method that injects knowledge triplets into a graph with market indicators to predict securities index trends via a GNN.
Leverages LLaMA models with news sentiment prompts to forecast stock prices, outperforming ARIMA and earlier LLaMA versions.
Uses GPT-4 to semantically rank features for an XGBoost forecaster of Malaysia’s KLCI, improving accuracy in low-resource settings.
Proposes LLMCatalyst, an incentive mechanism to encourage client participation in distributed foundation model (e.g., GPT-4) training through auction-based payments.
Presents LLMCompass, a hardware evaluation framework for efficient LLM inference; explores cost-performance tradeoffs.
LLMFactor extracts explanatory market factors via sequential prompting and uses them to predict stock movements from textualized price histories, beating prior methods.
Summarizes financial news then performs sentiment (FinBERT, VADER) and fuses with market features into an LGBM to predict multiclass hourly returns; FinBERT outranks GPT-3.5 in importance.
Presents an LLM-based dynamic strategy-switching method guided by reinforcement learning to adapt trading strategies to market regimes.
Predicts Australian NEM day-ahead electricity prices by integrating LLM-modeled bidding behavior and sentiment into an enhanced CTSGAN to improve spikes and price accuracy.
Demonstrates interactive data analysis of spectroscopy via an LLM on a smartphone for analytical chemistry tasks.
Review of LLMs for sentiment analysis with a Bitcoin case study showing modest sentiment–price correlations over longer horizons.
Presents ElliottAgents (LLM + DRL + RAG) to identify Elliott waves and improve trend prediction in stocks and crypto with interpretable insights.
Benchmarks pre-trained foundation models (incl. GPT-2-backbone transformers) for time-series forecasting in financial-aid settings with scarce data.
A survey of how LLMs are used in finance, covering tasks, methods, datasets, and benchmarks for practitioners and researchers.
Review of LLM applications in equity markets (2022–2025): tasks, methods (prompting, fine-tuning, multi-agent, RL), datasets, gaps, and future directions.
Detects lead–lag clusters in multivariate systems via directed networks and validates on U.S. equities, illustrating construction of predictive signals.
Introduces StockNF, a normalizing-flow model to jointly learn latent variables from tweets and prices for stock movement prediction, beating prior methods.
Reviews AI in finance, noting that ChatGPT-3.5-extracted news can predict stock market index movements, highlighting risks of AI-induced collusion in trading.
SEP trains a self-reflective LLM that jointly explains and predicts stock movements, outperforming deep-learning baselines.
LASER forecasts volatility and BEAM (using GPT-2) generates natural-language narratives explaining the predictions.
Forecasts Vietnamese rice export prices with optimized forecasters; LLM-derived sentiment plus macro features boost CatBoost reliability.
Uses LLM-assisted active learning to improve sentiment models on Hungarian economic news and nowcast macro indicators like GDP, PMI, and unemployment.
Uses Llama-3.1 with RAG and fresh fundamentals to construct multi-asset portfolios; RAG-enhanced LLM outperforms vanilla.
Explores LLMs (with persona ensembles) to predict price movements for stock and bond portfolios from macro indicators; LLM-based strategies beat buy-and-hold in high-CPI periods.
Fuses LLM-derived news sentiment with quantitative features to improve valuation of short-dated stock options for NIFTY-50 names.
Proposes knowledge-enhanced prompting (DK-CoT) to improve LLM-based financial news sentiment classification versus prior methods.
LoopGAN (CGAN/LSGAN) with recursive feedback achieves low MAPE on DJIA multi-step forecasts, beating LSTM/RNN.
Introduces MGGPT, blending GATs with GPT-style transformers to detect fraud in crypto transaction networks, outperforming dynamic baselines.
Wasserstein GAN with GRU generator and CNN discriminator improves robustness of stock price forecasts across pre/post-COVID regimes.
Models SP500 index with input-warped Student t-processes to handle non-stationarity and heavy tails, emphasizing uncertainty estimates.
Introduces an LLM-based ChatGPT Score to augment A-share stock models; ML (CatBoost/RF) and FF5+ChatGPT Score improve predictions.
Hermes offloads cold neurons to NDP-DIMMs to make LLM inference affordable; systems paper, not a finance predictor.
MambaLLM fuses micro-stock SSM encodings with an LLM-interpreted macro index narrative (distilled to embeddings) to predict major U.S. stocks.
Introduces a meta graphical lasso to reveal sparse interactions among latent factors, illustrated with finance and medicine datasets.
Proposes MoF, a background-aware fusion mechanism that combines stock data with event/policy text; MacBERT creates features to improve directional stock forecasts over LSTM baselines.
MANAGER predicts asset movement/volatility from MPC call text, audio, and video using external knowledge and a ChatGLM2 backbone in a cross-modal graph.
LLaMA-based temporal–text prompt tuning maps stock sequences into LLM space; adapted LLM outperforms mainstream temporal models on NIFTY50.
Uses generative diffusion models on stock-chart images to simulate price paths and estimate S&P 500 option prices.
Models S&P 500 evolution with input-warped Student-t processes to handle non-stationarity and heavy tails, emphasizing uncertainty around structural breaks.
Proposes GAN-TrellisNet with rich multi-factor inputs for stock price prediction, outperforming GAN/LSTM baselines.
Combines financial metrics with tweets/news; uses ChatGPT-4o/FinBERT sentiment feeding an LSTM to improve stock price forecasts.
Predicts Bitcoin prices with a multimodal model where GPT-3.5 summarizes news whose embeddings augment price features.
NeuralFactors learns equity factors via deep generative modeling for risk and portfolio tasks with interpretability benefits.
Builds a news-evaluation model for Japan’s auto industry; augments with GPT-2-generated news and co-occurrence networks to predict stock price fluctuations with higher accuracy.
Introduces a DSE-focused dataset and shows BERT-based models beat multiple ML/DL baselines for Dhaka Stock Exchange movement prediction.
Survey-based study in Pakistan linking ChatGPT usage dimensions to investors’ decision making with moderation by financial literacy.
Introduces signature-kernel scoring rules to train Neural SDEs non-adversarially; demonstrates conditional probabilistic forecasts for real forex pairs and other market data.
Models microscopic dynamics of threaded social-media conversations (crypto, cybersecurity) with a generative model; shows moderate short-term predictive power and long-range limits.
Presents an online generative-model personalization method for real-time hand tracking on depth cameras; unrelated to financial prediction.
Integrates uncertainty sentiment with PSO-tuned SVR to forecast stock returns, reducing RMSE/MAE/MAPE.
Introduces a generalized passage times (GPT) method to estimate jump-diffusion parameters and compares forecasts on gold share prices.
Proposes Path Shadowing Monte Carlo to predict realized volatility and option smiles using a generative price model, outperforming low-parametric and market quotes on S&P 500 options.
Proposes PAFrame to align text and time-series via contrastive learning and prompts, then uses language models with financial indicators for final prediction, outperforming baselines.
Uses textual and contextual earnings-call features (including LLM-derived) with fundamentals/technicals to predict PEAD and improve trading returns.
ChatGPT-annotated Reddit sentiment fine-tunes RoBERTa for GME/AMC; sentiment weakly correlates with price, volume/search trends stronger.
Learns a mixture generative model to infer how pre-search contexts trigger queries, improving intent prediction and auto-completion.
Extracts sentiment from sell-side analyst reports using RoBERTa/FinBERT/GPT and shows it forecasts IBEX-35 constituents’ price trends.
Fine-tunes GPT-2 with prompt-designed numeric inputs to predict FX rate changes from limit-order data.
Literature review on price prediction under complexity, highlighting the rise of hybrid/AI approaches and future attention on LLMs.
Uses Bayesian models to quantify short-term price drift after analysts’ recommendation revisions in Hong Kong and derives profitable strategies.
Multimodal framework combining DL with LLM+RAG, real-time sentiment, and technicals to improve stock trend prediction.
Proposes QUEST for efficient EMTC with quantized/hashed LLM fine-tuning on commodity hardware; not a finance predictor.
Classifies firms’ AI engagement from 10-K filings to build AI stock indices that rival AI-themed ETFs in risk-return performance.
RAG-LLM and BERT tokenization feed a random multi-hierarchical attention network for sentiment on long reviews; generic SA, not prices.
TechGPT (prices) + SentiGPT (text) combine as IntegraGPT; multiple LLMs produce predictions and rationales to address interpretability/bias.
Applies BERT to measure financial-report readability and shows it predicts firms’ stock price crash risk, especially with entrenched CEOs.
Combines Gaussian-process regression with generative text models in a Bayesian online change-point detector, improving long-term change prediction for stock prices and movie revenues.
News-fine-tuned Llama-3.1 produces stock recommendations; a separate forecaster predicts closing prices for prompts; mixed sectoral accuracy.
Uses RAG-enhanced LLM sentiment from text/images plus transfer learning to build multi-source data for exchange-rate prediction.
A retracted paper describing a multivariate time-series framework for identifying lead-lag relationships in equity markets using directed network clustering.
Proposes HD-SURDLM combining multi-source sentiment (Twitter/news) with dynamic models to improve multi-asset return forecasts.
Conceptual framework linking disruptions to technologies (blockchain, digital twins, generative AI, quantum) for OSCM risk.
Risk-sensitive control for safe crowd-robot interaction using Trajectron++ trajectory forecasts; not finance-related.
SARF blends FinGPT-based sentiment with Random Forest to improve stock trend prediction over RF/LSTM baselines.
Proposes self-evolving programs combining LLM methods with Quine programs, including a security-oriented Bitcoin case study.
Builds AMR-based document graphs with finance-domain LLM embeddings and a GNN to predict stock trend directions from long earnings calls.
Shows compact attention-based models (non-LLMs) can perform semantic reasoning over biomedical knowledge bases on modest hardware.
Builds a system that scrapes economic news, performs sentiment analysis, and uses ML to forecast stock movements.
Builds a two-stage ChatGPT pipeline on Bloomberg market wraps to form a market sentiment score used to trade the NASDAQ index.
Benchmarks LLMs (OPT/BERT/FinBERT) for news sentiment and shows LLM-driven sentiment predicts stock returns with high Sharpe.
Cascade classifier using BERT/GPT and GloVe on news headlines predicts within-hour crypto price direction with 79% accuracy.
Presents a Generative-AI-powered finance community with an LSTM advisor (“FinLit”) and budgeting tools; education-oriented.
Uses generative modeling and dynamic simulation for solar/urban planning under densification; not a finance study.
Introduces and evaluates a 'solution probing attack' exploiting anonymity in blockchain-based crowdsourcing systems, showing vulnerabilities even with coin mixing defenses.
Stacks generative and discriminative classifiers with a neural meta-learner to predict cryptocurrency price direction using technical and sentiment indicators.
Builds a framework that aligns tweets with index data, performs zero-shot sentiment, and uses a pretrained time-series model to forecast market trends on major indices.
Survey of stock-market forecasting with emphasis on LLM roles, hybridization, RL, and open challenges.
Forecasts multi-asset stock return scenarios with a conditional flow-based generative model, capturing cross-asset dependencies and improving diversity/accuracy.
Compares modern LLMs for news sentiment and shows adding LLM-based sentiment to Informer/Transformer improves stock price prediction.
Adds FinBERT sentiment features from news headlines to LSTM intraday price models; FinBERT features significantly improve prediction over price-only baselines.
Hybrid deep learning predicts stock prices from multiple feature groups and then uses LLMs to narrate the drivers of the forecasts.
Multimodal stock prediction where sentiment from FinBERT and ChatGPT-4o augments LSTM; ensembles outperform single LSTM.
Concept piece on building a trading bot for stock prediction with ML; lacks concrete LLM usage details.
Uses a distilled LLM to score emotions in headlines and feeds them to ML classifiers to predict stock price direction.
Builds complex-network factors and GPT-KNN sentiment; LSTM with these features improves semiconductor stock trend accuracy.
Uses BERT on financial news to predict stock trends, significantly improving accuracy over baselines.
Applies DRAGAN with feature matching to stabilize GAN-based stock forecasting and beat LSTM/GAN variants.
HMM-WGAN simulates multivariate stock returns reproducing stylized facts and improving VaR estimation; simulator/risk focus.
Proposes a generative model of news conditioned on price movement to predict daily stock moves on Nikkei 225 and S&P 500, outperforming SVM/MLP baselines.
Applies BERT on financial news to predict stock price movements, significantly improving accuracy over baselines.
Describes StockAI, a tool combining classic indicators and ML (e.g., random forests) with a natural-language interface for investor analysis.
Generates synthetic financial time series via regime clustering and a modified QuantGAN, improving similarity to real data and aiding downstream forecasting.
Uses deep generative models to create synthetic data for training trading-signal predictors; improves backtested performance in commodities and FX.
TAIL-GAN simulates multi-asset scenarios that preserve tail risk features (VaR/ES) and generalize across datasets.
Generates synthetic tabular samples with GANs and trains TabNet for stock return prediction, improving profits on Chinese market data.
Analyzes and detects ‘collusion scams’ in YouTube crypto-video comments; shows modern LLMs like ChatGPT can flag scams without training.
Reinforcement-enhanced LLM architecture for discovering and explaining temporal patterns; applied to S&P 500 and weather data.
Introduces CanPrompt to reduce hallucinations and improve LLM accuracy for cancer-care Q&A tasks.
Uses ChatGPT-derived news sentiment as features in an SVR model to predict the Jakarta Composite Index.
Analyzes whether academic publications affect Bitcoin prices; topic models and BERT/Word2Vec show weak influence.
Links Twitter sentiment and activity to Turkish BIST 30 prices using transformers and ML; tweet volume and positive sentiment help predict stocks.
Builds a large-scale system to detect crypto investment scam websites and analyzes their infrastructure and losses.
Integrates ChatGPT-labeled news sentiment into LSTM models to predict Jakarta Composite Index metrics, with sequential sentiment improving accuracy.
Perspective on the commoditization of AI for molecule design across industries and future integration with automated pipelines.
Argues computing is shifting from general-purpose CPUs to specialized processors (e.g., GPUs) as progress slows; discusses implications for AI and Bitcoin mining.
Review of AI’s impact on diplomacy and society, contrasting practical and generative AI applications and associated risks.
Empirical study of delayed block trades on Gemini’s Bitcoin market showing delayed reporting discourages informed trading and reduces informativeness.
Uses ChatGPT to extract and weight topics from texts to build a sentiment index that boosts exchange-rate forecasting by interval models.
Event study of how E&Y’s sale of its consulting unit to Cap Gemini affected client firms’ stock prices; finds positive abnormal returns around approval events.
Conceptual paper arguing for an environmental/supply-chain view of AI infrastructure and harms, focusing on data centers and extractive asymmetries.
Introduces SPRY, a memory-efficient federated finetuning algorithm for LLMs using forward-mode AD, enabling edge-device finetuning with low memory.
Bitcoin price forecasting with ARIMA/LSTM/Prophet; adding volume/sentiment helps; no concrete LLM usage stated.
Introduces Topic Factor Modelling, a joint generative model linking text themes to equity time-series factors; demonstrates on public equity data.
RL framework for energy futures trading that integrates LLM-enabled sentiment/disagreement analysis and connectedness methods; outperforms price-only baselines on WTI.
Transformer applied to synthetic OU and S&P 500; shows results for next-move/volatility tasks; not LLM-based.
Compares transformer variants vs LSTM for forecasting metal returns/prices across six metals.
Survey of transformers/attention networks in quantitative finance (alpha, risk, portfolio, execution).
Argues generative AI (e.g., GANs) can enhance data quality and LSTM stock forecasting via augmentation and anomaly detection, improving RMSE and R².
Evaluates zero-shot ChatGPT-3.5 for forex-news sentiment; ChatGPT beats FinBERT and correlates better with returns.
TrendTrader uses an LLM for news sentiment and trend heuristics within an RL portfolio manager to enhance stability and returns.
ChatGPT assesses severe-weather text to forecast stock return impacts; signals improve cross-sectional return prediction in certain regimes.
LLM-extracted ESG/geopolitical/supply-chain risks with financials in an LSTM improve firm-specific volatility forecasts.
Generates synthetic musculoskeletal gaits to pre-train models for healthcare gait analysis, improving generalization across settings.
Extracts explicit buy/sell ‘crowd’ signals from social media with LLM-based NLP and shows they predict short-term cryptocurrency moves and enable profitable strategies.
